description.english: Bring Glut Tony back down to size
description.french: Aide Tony le glouton à maigrir
description.german: Mach Fred Fresser eine Nummer kleiner.
description.italian: Fai recuperare al Ghiottone le sue dimensioni
description.japanese: 食べすぎトニーを元のサイズにもどす
description.schinese: 将大胃托尼变回正常大小
description.spanish: Mete en cintura a Gol Oso.

displayName.japanese: ねむりのきゅうせいしゅ

description.english: Wake the Queen of Sleep from her Nightmare
description.french: Sors la Reine du sommeil de son cauchemar
description.german: Erwecke die Königin des Schlafs aus ihrem Albtraum.
description.italian: Risveglia la Regina del sonno dal suo incubo
description.japanese: ねむりの女王をあくむから起こす
description.schinese: 唤醒噩梦中的睡梦女王
description.spanish: Despierta a la Reina de los Sueños de su pesadilla.

description.english: Release Fredrick from the magic spell of his wand
description.french: Libère Fredrick de l'emprise magique de sa baguette
description.german: Erlöse Fredrick von dem Zauber seines Zauberstabs.
description.italian: Libera Fredrick dall'incantesimo della sua bacchetta
description.japanese: フリードリヒをつえのじゅもんから自由にする
description.schinese: 使弗雷德里克摆脱其魔杖的魔咒
description.spanish: Libera a Frederik del hechizo mágico de su varita.

description.english: Find your friends
description.french: Retrouve tes amis
description.german: Finde deine Freunde.
description.italian: Trova i tuoi amici
description.japanese: 友だちを見つける
description.schinese: 找到你的朋友
description.spanish: Encuentra a tus amigos.

displayName.english: Need To Dig a Hole Now...
displayName.german: Jetzt müssen wir ein Loch graben ...

description.english: Find all of the Bones
description.french: Trouve tous les os
description.german: Finde alle Knochen.
description.italian: Trova tutti gli ossi
description.japanese: すべてのほねを見つける
description.schinese: 找到所有骨头
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los huesos.

description.english: Find All the Boingles in Food World
description.french: Trouve tous les Boingles dans le monde alimentaire
description.german: Finde alle Boingles in der Welt des Essens.
description.italian: Trova tutti i Boingle nel Mondo del cibo
description.japanese: フードワールドですべてのボイングルを見つける
description.schinese: 在食物世界找到所有混种狗
description.spanish: Encuentra a todos los Boingles en el Mundo de la Comida.

description.english: Find All Boingles in Sleep World
description.french: Trouve tous les Boingles dans le monde du sommeil
description.german: Finde alle Boingles in der Welt des Schlafens.
description.italian: Trova tutti i Boingle nel Mondo del sonno
description.japanese: スリープワールドですべてのボイングルを見つける
description.schinese: 在睡梦世界找到所有混种狗
description.spanish: Encuentra a todos los Boingles en el Mundo del Sueño.

displayName.japanese: おもちゃばこマスター

description.english: Find All Boingles in Play World
description.french: Trouve tous les Boingles dans le monde des jeux
description.german: Finde alle Boingles in der Welt des Spielens.
description.italian: Trova tutti i Boingle nel Mondo del gioco
description.japanese: プレイワールドですべてのボイングルを見つける
description.schinese: 在游乐世界找到所有混种狗
description.spanish: Encuentra a todos los Boingles en el Mundo de los Juegos.

description.english: Collect Everything
description.french: Ramasse tout
description.german: Sammle alles.
description.italian: Raccogli tutto
description.japanese: すべてを集める
description.schinese: 集齐所有物品
description.spanish: Consíguelo todo.

description.english: Buy Every hat
description.french: Achète tous les chapeaux
description.german: Kaufe alle Hüte
description.italian: Compra tutti i cappelli
description.japanese: すべてのぼうしを買う
description.schinese: 购买每一顶帽子
description.spanish: Compra todos los sombreros.

description.english: What happens to all that food…?
description.french: Où est passée toute la nourriture ?
description.german: Was ist nur mit dem ganzen Futter passiert ...?
description.italian: Cosa ne sarà di tutto quel cibo...?
description.japanese: あの食べ物はどこへ…？
description.schinese: 这些食物都怎么了...？
description.spanish: ¿Dónde está toda la comida?

description.english: OOHH! Belly Rubs!
description.french: OOH ! Des chatouilles !
description.german: Juhu! Bauchkraulen!
description.italian: OOHH! Una grattatina!
description.japanese: わあい！なでなで！
description.schinese: 哦！揉肚子！
description.spanish: ¡Aaay! ¡Caricitas en la barriguita!

description.english: Herd all the Fluffy Munchlets back into their pens.
description.french: Ramène tous les minigloutons dans leur enclos
description.german: Treibe alle fluffigen Mampflinge wieder in ihre Gehege.
description.italian: Riporta tutti i Munchlet pelosi nei loro recinti
description.japanese: すべてのフワフワマンチレットをさくの中にもどす
description.schinese: 把所有毛茸茸的大嘴怪赶回围栏里。
description.spanish: Lleva a todos los glotones esponjosos de vuelta al redil.

description.english: Become the Champion of the Fair
description.french: Deviens le champion de la foire
description.german: Werde zum Gewinner des Jahrmarkts.
description.italian: Diventa il campione della fiera
description.japanese: コンテストでゆうしょうする
description.schinese: 成为集市冠军
description.spanish: Sé el campeón de la feria.

description.english: Sprinkle some marshmallows into the Mountaintop Soup
description.french: Saupoudre de la guimauve sur la soupe montagnarde
description.german: Streue ein paar Marshmallows in die Bergspitzensuppe.
description.italian: Cospargi marshmallow nella zuppa di montagna
description.japanese: マシュマロを山のてっぺんのスープにふりかける
description.schinese: 在山顶汤里撒点棉花糖
description.spanish: Echa unos malvaviscos en la sopa de la montaña.

description.english: Catch a Slice of Toast mid-air
description.french: Attrape une tranche de pain grillé en plein vol
description.german: Fange eine Scheibe Toast in der Luft.
description.italian: Afferra una fetta di pane tostato a mezz'aria
description.japanese: 空中でトーストを1まいキャッチする
description.schinese: 在半空中抓一片吐司
description.spanish: Atrapa una tostada en el aire.

description.english: Uncover one of Sleep World’s DARKEST Secrets
description.french: Révèle l'un des secrets les PLUS SOMBRES du monde du sommeil
description.german: Entdecke eines der DUNKELSTEN Geheimnisse der Welt des Schlafens.
description.italian: Scopri uno dei segreti PIÙ OSCURI del Mondo del sonno
description.japanese: スリープワールドでもっとも暗いひみつをとき明かす
description.schinese: 揭开睡梦世界一个最黑暗的秘密
description.spanish: Descubre uno de los secretos más oscuros del Mundo del Sueño.

description.english: Rescue the King Glorb without getting caught
description.french: Sauve le roi Glorb sans te faire attraper
description.german: Rette König Glorb ohne Entdeckt zu werden.
description.italian: Salva il re Glorb senza farti catturare
description.japanese: つかまらずにキンググローブを助ける
description.schinese: 营救光珠国王时没有被抓住
description.spanish: Rescata al rey Glorb sin que te pillen.

description.english: Rowing can be pretty dangerous...
description.french: Ramer, c'est parfois dangereux…
description.german: Rudern kann ziemlich gefährlich sein ...
description.italian: Remare può essere piuttosto pericoloso...
description.japanese: 時にあぶないボートこぎ…
description.schinese: 划船很危险...
description.spanish: Remar puede ser muy peligroso...

description.english: You're just not loud enough to wake them up
description.french: Tu n'aboies pas assez fort pour réveiller qui que ce soit
description.german: Du bist einfach nicht laut genug, um sie aufzuwecken.
description.italian: Non è abbastanza forte per svegliarlo
description.japanese: 起こすには声の大きさがたりない
description.schinese: 你的声音太小了，叫不醒它们
description.spanish: No haces el ruido suficiente para despertarlos.

description.english: Show Granny Spider your appreciation
description.french: Une marque d'appréciation envers Tatie araignée
description.german: Zeige der Oma-Spinne, dass du dankbar bist.
description.italian: Mostra a nonna ragno la tua gratitudine
description.japanese: オババグモにありがとうを言う
description.schinese: 向蜘蛛奶奶表达感谢
description.spanish: Muéstrale tu agradecimiento a la abuela araña.

description.english: A hug makes everything better
description.french: Un câlin et tout va bien
description.german: Eine Umarmung macht alles besser
description.italian: Un abbraccio rende tutto migliore
description.japanese: ハグこそさいきょう
description.schinese: 拥抱化解一切
description.spanish: Todo es mejor con un abrazo.

description.english: They should really install some level crossings on this beach...
description.french: Il faudrait installer des passages à niveau sur cette plage…
description.german: Auf diesem Stand sollten sie wirklich mal ein paar Levelweichen aufstellen ...
description.italian: Dovrebbero davvero installare dei passaggi a livello su questa spiaggia...
description.japanese: このビーチをわたるには高さがひつようだ…
description.schinese: 他们真应该在这个沙滩上设一些道口...
description.spanish: Deberían instalar unos pasos a nivel en esta playa...

description.english: Get a hole in one
description.french: Fais un trou en un
description.german: Schaffe ein Hole-in-One.
description.italian: Fai una buca con un colpo solo
description.japanese: ホールインワンを決める
description.schinese: 一杆进洞
description.spanish: Cuélala a la primera.

displayName.german: Das Zeug, als dem Albträume sind

description.english: In Play World Level 3, Ring the Bell without losing the Glorb
description.french: Dans le niveau 3 du monde des jeux, fais sonner la cloche sans perdre le Glorb
description.german: Läute die Glocke im 3. Level der Welt des Spielens, ohne den Glorb zu verlieren.
description.italian: Nel livello 3 del Mondo del gioco, suona la campana senza perdere il Glorb
description.japanese: プレイワールドのステージ3で、グローブをなくさずにベルを鳴らす
description.schinese: 在游乐世界第3关，敲响钟声且不丢失光珠
description.spanish: En el nivel 3 de Mundo de los Juegos, haz sonar la campana sin perder al Glorb.

description.english: Ride off into the sunset without a scratch
description.french: Slalome sans une égratignure
description.german: Fahre ohne einen Kratzer in den Sonnenuntergang
description.italian: Riparti al tramonto senza nemmeno un graffio
description.japanese: きず1つなく夕日の中に走り去る
description.schinese: 安然无恙地离开，去看日落
description.spanish: Dirígete hacia el atardecer sin haber sufrido ni un rasguño.

description.english: Win the Space Race
description.french: Gagne la course de l'espace à la fin du niveau de jeu 4
description.german: Gewinne das Weltraumrennen
description.italian: Vinci la gara spaziale
description.japanese: スペースレースに勝つ
description.schinese: 在速度竞赛中获胜
description.spanish: Gana la carrera espacial.

displayName.japanese: 大きいイッヌ、小さいイッヌ

description.english: Get swallowed by a Worm with one big head and one small head.
description.french: Sois avalé par un ver à deux têtes, une grosse et une petite
description.german: Lass dich von einem Wurm mit einem großen Kopf und einem kleinen Kopf verschlucken.
description.italian: Fatti ingurgitare da un verme avendo una testa grande e una piccola
description.japanese: 大きな頭と小さな頭を持つワームに飲みこまれる
description.schinese: 被有着一个大脑袋和一个小脑袋的蠕虫吞掉了。
description.spanish: Que te trague un gusano con una cabeza grande y una pequeña.

description.english: How do the Worms even digest these?
description.french: Comment les vers font-ils pour avaler ça ?
description.german: Wie verdauen die Würmer das überhaupt?
description.italian: Come fanno i vermi a digerire questa roba?
description.japanese: ワームはどうやって消化するんだろう？
description.schinese: 蠕虫是怎么消化这些的呢？
description.spanish: ¿Cómo hacen los gusanos para digerir algo así?

description.english: See all the nice spots that the Phoggyverse has to offer
description.french: Visite tous les lieux les plus pittoresques de l'univers Phog
description.german: Besuche all die netten Orte, die das Phoggyversum zu bieten hat.
description.italian: Visita tutti i luoghi che il Phoggyverso ha da offrire
description.japanese: 「犬 犬」の世界にある、きれいなけしきをすべて見る
description.schinese: 查看狗狗宇宙的所有好地方
description.spanish: Descubre todos los lugares bonitos que te puede ofrecer el Phoggyverso.
